steps.title: Notice how active the dog is.
steps.content: Notice how active the dog is. Poodles are active dogs and love to play . They were bred as retrievers, so they need their daily dose of exercise, which should be about an hour every day. [31] X Research source

steps.title: Watch for intelligence.
steps.content: Watch for intelligence. The Poodle is one of the most intelligent dog breeds. Poodles are very trainable and pick up on things quickly. [33] X Research source

steps.title: See if the dog is sensitive.
steps.content: See if the dog is sensitive. Being emotionally sensitive, Poodles tend to notice the feelings of the people in their household. They are sensitive to stress, so it is important to keep them feeling peaceful. [34] X Research source

steps.title: Take notice of attentiveness.
steps.content: Take notice of attentiveness. Poodles are fairly alert and attentive, likely related to their intelligence and hunting instincts. They are quick to respond because of this and may bark. [35] X Research source

steps.title: Check if the dog prefers being around humans.
steps.content: Check if the dog prefers being around humans. Poodles prefer being around people rather than other dogs. They are friendly and affectionate with their family, though they may be wary around strangers. [36] X Research source
